function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mutual interaction becoming more vital during the pandemic period","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene and social distancing measures","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, UV-C disinfection technology","People":"Customers, employees, external stakeholders","Owner":"Business owners, management, local government"},{"Description":"Psychological burden due to negative experiences during the pandemic","Impact":"Mental health issues and anxiety among customers and employees","Mitigation":"Providing clear communication and support, offering mental health resources","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, online counseling services","People":"Customers, employees, business owners","Owner":"Human resources, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Uncertainty and worry among actors in the service ecosystem","Impact":"Decreased confidence and trust in the service ecosystem","Mitigation":"Transparent communication, financial stability reassurance","Technologies":"Online communication platforms, financial forecasting software","People":"Customers, employees, business owners","Owner":"Management, financial advisors"}]}
